activities.name: Get Service Bus feed
activities.description: Get the enabled service bus feed from master pipeline config

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT STRING_AGG(entity_name, ', ') AS entities
FROM [odw_config_db].[dbo].[main_pipeline_config]
WHERE is_enabled = 1
AND System_name = 'Service bus'

activities.name: Get Horizon feed
activities.description: Get the enabled horizon feed from master pipeline config

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT STRING_AGG(Object, ', ') AS entities
FROM [odw_config_db].[dbo].[main_pipeline_config]
WHERE is_enabled = 1
AND System_name = 'Horizon'
